seo.baseDescription: Leading medical university in Kyrgyzstan. Quality medical education, modern research and training of international level doctors.
seo.baseKeywords: medical education, medical university, Kyrgyzstan, Salymbekov University, doctors, healthcare, medical sciences, higher education

home.title: Home
home.description: Salymbekov University - leading higher medical educational institution in Kyrgyzstan. Modern educational programs, qualified teachers and advanced technologies.
